sentences.en: A powerful searchlight cut into the night, bouncing into the sky.
sentences.cn: 一道强烈的探照灯光刺进黑夜, 直射天空.

sentences.en: Bertha came bouncing into the room.
sentences.cn: 伯莎蹦蹦跳跳地进了房间.

sentences.en: Children like bouncing up and down on a sofa.
sentences.cn: 孩子们喜欢在沙发上蹦蹦跳跳.

sentences.en: From bouncing confidence she had retreated into self-pity.
sentences.cn: 她从信心百倍变得自怜自哀。

sentences.en: He kept bouncing up and down like a yo-yo .
sentences.cn: 他像个悠悠球似的蹦蹦跳跳。

sentences.en: Often of a morning Babbitt came bouncing and jesting in to breakfast.
sentences.cn: 巴比特往常总是兴冲冲地,有说有笑地下楼吃早饭.

sentences.en: Patsy had picked up the baby and was bouncing him on her knee.
sentences.cn: 帕齐抱起婴儿放在膝上颠动着。

sentences.en: The boy was bouncing up and down on the bed.
The children were bouncing a ball.
The wind was bouncing the branches of the big oak trees.
sentences.cn: 一棵棵高大橡树的枝条随风摇摆。

sentences.en: Then I noticed the car was bouncing up and down as if someone were jumping on it.
sentences.cn: 然后我注意到那辆车在上下颠簸，好像有人在车上蹦跳似的。

sentences.en: They are bouncing with health in the good weather.
sentences.cn: 在这种宜人的天气里，他们健康活泼地茁壮成长。

sentences.en: They work by bouncing microwaves off solid objects.
sentences.cn: 它们的工作原理是通过固体来反射微波。

sentences.en: Your arms and legs need protection from light bouncing off glass.
sentences.cn: 需要保护你的手臂和双腿免受玻璃反射光线的照射。

words.tran_cn: 有弹性的；快活的；精神饱满的；自大的
有义务的；受约束的；装有封面的
保镖；巨大的东西；跳跃的人；吹牛者

phrases.tran_cn: 弹力球；活力球；跳跃小球；球形病毒

trans.tran_cn: 精力充沛的，精神饱满的，活泼的
